HIDDeviceReceiveFeatureReport.summary: The receiveFeatureReport() method of the interface receives a feature report from the HID device. Feature reports are a way for HID devices and applications to exchange non-standardized HID data.

remarks.para: The reportId for each of the report formats that this device supports can be retrieved from .

HIDDeviceReceiveFeatureReport.returns: A which resolves with a object containing the feature report.
